titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain printing machinery.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/5/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1999, the duty on ink-jet textile printing machinery. Provides for retroactive application of such temporary duty suspension upon request.
